Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25153 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 20.10.25-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-25153 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 20.10.25-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 20.10.25-3, affected by CVE-2023-25153
